channel.title: case on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in case on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: Case Layout
item.description: 1 Case timer – Displays the duration of the surgical case. 2 Record video button – Starts and stops recording video of the screen. A red dot appears next to the case when a case is being recorded. 3 Snapshot button – Takes a picture of the screen. 4 Information panel – Displays basic information to identify the current patient and case. 5 Quick Access Bar – Includes buttons to quickly change various display settings.

item.title: Settings
item.description: To adjust image settings, click Settings. 1 Vit System button – Includes overlay options and imaging mode linking. 2 Phaco System button – Includes overlay options. 3 Screen Layout button – Adjusts the display layout and what features are included during surgical cases. 4 Recording button – Sets video parameters. 5 Color Channels button – Manages color emphasis. 6 Light Profiles button – Adjusts colors depending on the light source.
